metadataAttributes.Title: Assets in Accounting
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: In this second course, you will dive deeper into the world of bookkeeping and focus on accounting for assets.  If you are familiar with bookkeeping basics, such as double entry accounting, you are ready for this course. You will gain an understanding of common asset types, learn how to account for inventory, calculate cost of goods sold, and work with Property, Plant, and Equipment (PP&E). Upon completing this course, you will use your new knowledge of assets to record transactions and produce financial statements for increasingly complex business situations.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Accounts receivable and cash receipts,Inventory costing methods,PP&E Accounting,Asset Accounting,Depreciation,
